channel.title: How come no one can join my server?
channel.description: i tried to have my friend go on my server but he couldn't, im the only one that can log in, can anyone help?

item.title: How come no one can join my server?
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

Kingcott:

you havent portfowarded properly or if your using a client you havent changed the ip address to the proper one instead of 0.0.0.0, or 127.0.0.1 which is localhost.

lol he is right untill the 0.0.0.0 thing

for the Ip you put in your No-ip address so they can login to that IP otherwise no one can login

Read full topic
item.source: How come no one can join my server?

item.title: How come no one can join my server?
item.dc:creator: @Kingcott Kingcott
item.description:
@Kingcott wrote:

then do the second part, and go to your client.java, or gui.java in your CLIENT FILES; change that ip to the portfowarded ip then people will be able to connect or your hosting wireless improperly.

Read full topic
